Title: Pargo' express delivery services launches its work in Egypt
Description: Pargo, the South African company specializing in express delivery services, said that it has launched its services in Egypt, adding about 350 additional receiving points after a successful experiment to test the market in the largest Arab country in terms of population.

Title: Kuwait signs contracts worth $1.3 billion for road maintenance
Description: On Wednesday, Kuwaiti Minister of Public Works, Noura Al-Mashaan, signed 18 contracts with a number of local and foreign companies to maintain roads in Kuwait, after they were damaged over the past years.

Title: Ancelotti talks about 'behind the scenes of the win' over Dortmun...
Description: Italian Carlo Ancelotti, coach of the Spanish football team Real Madrid, expressed his happiness with the performance his team presented against German Borussia Dortmund yesterday, Tuesday, in the Champions League, and was able to overturn a deficit by two clean goals to win 5-2.

Title: Under Israeli bombardment...the 'displacement bomb' threatens the...
Description: With the Israeli army expanding the scope of its raids on Lebanon, questions arise about the strategic goal of these raids, and the extent of the Lebanese state’s ability to bear the financial burdens of the destruction, as well as the cohesion of the social incubator in light of the massive displacement movement resulting from the military operations.

Title: Deutsche Bank returns to profitability in the third quarter
Description: Deutsche Bank's profits rose beyond expectations during the third quarter of this year, thanks to growth in commission income and fees, after settling litigation that led to losses in the second quarter.

Title: Putin proposes establishing an investment platform for BRICS memb...
Description: Russian President Vladimir Putin proposed creating an investment platform that would be made available among the member states of the BRICS group.

Title: The President of the UAE attends the BRICS summit
Description: Today, Wednesday, the President of the UAE, Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan, participates in the 16th summit of leaders of the BRICS countries, which was opened by Russian President Vladimir Putin, in the Russian city of Kazan.

Description: Militias and armed factions have recently been subjected to strong blows, which have greatly affected their structure and combat ability, whether in Lebanon, Palestine, Syria, Yemen or Iraq, which has made some wonder: Is this the end of militias in the region?

Title: Temporary listing of The United Bank on the Egyptian Stock Exchan...
Description: Today, Wednesday, the Securities Registration Committee of the Egyptian Stock Exchange approved the temporary registration of United Bank shares with an issued and paid-up capital of 5.5 billion pounds, distributed into 1.1 billion shares with a nominal value of five pounds per share.

Title: Lloyds Bank profits fell 4% in the third quarter
Description: Lloyds Bank announced that its profits attributable to ordinary shareholders for the nine-month period that ended on September 30 fell to $4.35 billion from $5 billion achieved previously.
